title: Migrate Multi-provider Support (Gemini, Anthropic)
description:
Port core backend support for Gemini and Anthropic from the old fork to codex-rs/core.

STEPS:
1. Copy source files from old fork (core/src/):
   - gemini.rs
   - gemini_messages.rs
   - anthropic_messages.rs
2. Copy resource files:
   - core/gemini-3-prompt.md
3. Integrate into codex-rs/core:
   - Update lib.rs to expose modules
   - Update model_family.rs to include Gemini/Anthropic variants
   - Update model_provider_info logic if necessary

title: Port Gemini Support
description:
Port all Gemini-related code and assets.

FILES TO COPY:
- /core/src/gemini.rs
- /core/src/gemini_messages.rs
- /core/gemini-3-prompt.md

INTEGRATION:
- Add modules to core/src/lib.rs
- Register Gemini as a provider in core/src/model_family.rs

title: Port Anthropic Support
description:
Port Anthropic-related code.

FILES TO COPY:
- /core/src/anthropic_messages.rs

INTEGRATION:
- Add modules to core/src/lib.rs
- Register Anthropic as a provider in core/src/model_family.rs (if distinct from OpenAI/Gemini path)

title: Migrate Subagents Architecture
description:
Port the subagent orchestration logic to enable task delegation.

STEPS:
1. Copy core/src/subagents.rs to codex-rs/core/src/
2. Copy core/src/tools/handlers/task.rs to codex-rs/core/src/tools/handlers/
3. Register the 'task' tool in the core tool registry
4. Ensure the task handler hooks correctly into the event loop in codex-rs/app-server or core

title: Update TUI for New Providers and Subagents
description:
Adapt the TUI to render non-OpenAI models and subagent activities.

STEPS:
1. Port TUI view modes:
   - Copy/Adapt tui/src/tui/inline.rs
   - Copy/Adapt tui/src/tui/standard.rs
2. Update rendering logic:
   - Check tui/src/chatwidget.rs for provider-specific rendering adjustments
   - Ensure subagent tool calls are displayed correctly
